name: Good Morning
description: Targets the hamstrings and lower back with a hinge motion, building posterior chain strength.

name: Romanian Deadlift (Barbell)
description: Engages the hamstrings and glutes through a controlled hinge movement with a barbell.

name: Lying Leg Curl
description: Isolates the hamstrings by curling the legs from a lying position, enhancing muscle development.

name: Glute Ham Raise
description: Strengthens the hamstrings and glutes by lifting the body from the knees, improving posterior strength.

name: Nordic Hamstring Curls
description: An advanced bodyweight exercise that focuses on eccentric hamstring strength and injury prevention.

name: Deadlift (Band)
description: Targets the hamstrings and glutes with band resistance, improving stability and muscle activation.

name: Deadlift (Smith Machine)
description: Engages the hamstrings and back with controlled movement on a Smith machine for added stability.

name: Romanian Deadlift (Dumbbell)
description: A variation of the Romanian deadlift using dumbbells, focusing on hamstring and glute activation.

name: Seated Leg Curl
description: Isolates the hamstrings by curling the legs from a seated position, enhancing muscle development.

name: Deadlift (Barbell)
description: A compound lift that targets the hamstrings, glutes, and lower back, promoting full-body strength.

name: Deficit Deadlift
description: Increases the range of motion during deadlifts, enhancing hamstring and glute activation.

name: Deadlift (Dumbbell)
description: A dumbbell variation of the deadlift, emphasizing hamstring and glute strength.

name: Sumo Deadlift
description: A wider stance deadlift that targets the hamstrings and glutes with less stress on the lower back.

name: Stiff-Legged Deadlift
description: Stretches and strengthens the hamstrings by performing deadlifts with minimal knee bend.

name: Trap Bar Deadlift With High Handles
description: Utilizes a trap bar to reduce strain on the lower back while targeting hamstrings and glutes.

name: Trap Bar Deadlift With Low Handles
description: A variation of the trap bar deadlift with low handles, engaging hamstrings and glutes more intensely.

name: Pause Deadlift
description: Improves hamstring strength by pausing at specific points during the deadlift, increasing tension.

name: Romanian Deadlift (Smith Machine)
description: Targets hamstrings and glutes using the Smith machine for stability and controlled range of motion.
